data.title: Drei Schnittbücher: 3 16th c Austrian Master Tailor Books by Marion McNealy — Kickstarter
data.name: Marion McNealy
data.description: Never before published! Three rare 16th c tailoring manuscripts translated into English, with photos, diagrams, and descriptive text.

data.title: The Three Little Pigsburghers, as told in Pittsburghese by Joe Wos — Kickstarter
data.name: Joe Wos
data.description: The Three Little Pigsburghers is the first classic tale translated into Pittsburghese.  As written and illustrated by Joe Wos.
